data.title: Mizuno Wave Inspire 18
data.description: Feel inspired to run with the new Wave Inspire 18 running shoe for men, designed to make your daily runs feel effortless whilst supporting your technique. With MIZUNO ENERZY Foam at the heel wedge, it provides great cushioning and energy return. The Double Fan-Shaped Wave supports the movement of the foot to avoid overpronation. The improved upper design provides a seamless fit.
